snippet.title: BURN - Announce. Out August 9 2024.
snippet.description:
Become a pop star legend or monster in "BURN" from Convict Games coming to Steam in 2024. Wishlist Now. "BURN" is a single-player interactive story game told over 16 endings. Will you change pop music? Start a cult? Become a monster? You decide. You will BURN.

More Info & Merchandise: www.convictgames.com/burn

JOIN THE CONVICT GAMES EMAIL LIST @ www.convictgames.com 

FOLLOW US:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/convictgames
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/convictgames
Instagram:https://instagram.com/convictgames
